title: this community though
body: Gives me cancer. All people do is bitch about OP champions and flame riot. There's a handful of people that just play the game and appreciate riot for keeping lol f2p. I used to come on forums to read tips or ideas for champions but for the past year almost its been almost nothing but complains. Please keep your anger to yourself and let us continue to enjoy boards once again.

replies.body:
I think you should watch this video: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RoZLzfzsqSI

:D
And the endless amounts of trolls.....
Trolls aren't a problem to me. Just ignore them. In game, mute and accept the loss. I don't get pissed off a loss. It's more the attitudes people have

My view of the scale of how annoying a player is

Troll>AFK>Toxic
